item.title: Deep Dive: Lots more than I could put in a title
item.description: This week we look at psychological well-being - including from the U.S. Surgeon General, paying attention to the experience of detransitioners, exposomics, silence and epigenetics, Buddhism (religion or not), and my bone to pick with the Humanist Chaplaincy Network (I’m not picking any bones with humanist chaplains).

item.title: The Dunning-Kruger Effect
item.description: We all want to believe in the impossible. We, you and me, will never die. Or, at best, it’s will be far into the future: we don’t need to worry about it now. Nothing could be farther from the truth. This true story tells how wrogn our assumptions can be.
